Female Personal Assistant (Live-in) Job at RNP Services




        
    

        
        RNP Services is an HR Services company for corporate bodies and individual.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Personal Assistant (Live-in)

Job Location: Enugu
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Assist in office related role to a professor.
	Schedule meeting etc.


Requirements
     

            
    




	Minimum qualifications of a Bachelor Degree.
	1 - 4 years of relevant experience.
	Must be a computer literate.
	Smart and neat.
	Preferably a female.
	Must live in Enugu.


Remuneration


	Salary: N150,000 monthly.
	Accommodation is available


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to: rnpconsultingng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "title": "ICT Assistant Manager",
  "description": "Ocean Marine Solutions Limited is a strategically positioned organization operating the marine industry to provide solutions to high-risks security concerns in Nigerian waters.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: ICT Assistant Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers

Job Duties &amp; Responsibilities


	Coordinate design and implementation with Head ICT to ensure alignment with area/cluster objectives and corporate strategic IT direction
	Identify and implement solutions to user challenges and concerns associated with the use of personal computer equipment
	Monitor, Diagnose, and adjust performance on LAN and networks
	Manage shared technology resources
	Carry out periodic preventative maintenance on machines to ensure their reliability and availability
	Manage secure network access for remote users
	Keep up to date with new technology
	Evaluating technology risks to develop a network disaster recovery plan and backup procedures.
	To be able to quickly and competently diagnose network issues and to resolve or externally escalate them when required
	To assist in the production and maintenance of documentation relating to the Company&rsquo;s ICT system
	To assist in the administration of the Company&rsquo;s communication systems including mobile phones, internet connection, and telephone system
	Takes responsibility for the day-to-day operational effectiveness of the Company&rsquo;s ICT security and compliance with the responsibility of investigating Cybersecurity breaches


&nbsp;Educational Qualifications, Certifications and&nbsp;Experience


	Educational Qualifications:
	
		Minimum of an HND qualification&nbsp;/ B.Sc Degree in Electrical Electronics, Computer Science / Engineering, or other applicable Degree course.
		Necessary certifications such as CCNA, CCNP, CISA, MCSA, et al
	
	
	Experience:
	
		Minimum of 5 years of experience in a similar role.
	
	
	Competencies:
	
		WAN &amp; LAN Management
		VPN
		System troubleshooting
		System maintenance
		Database management
		Microsoft Windows network infrastructure savvy
		AD and DNS savvy
		Knowledge of ICT regulations
		Attention to detail
		Report writing
		Crisis Management skills
		Interpersonal skills
	
	


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to the &quot;HR &amp; Admin department&quot; via:&nbsp;recruitment@ocean-ms.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

ICT Assistant Manager Job at Ocean Marine Solutions Limited




        
    

        
        Ocean Marine Solutions Limited is a strategically positioned organization operating the marine industry to provide solutions to high-risks security concerns in Nigerian waters.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: ICT Assistant Manager

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers

Job Duties & Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Coordinate design and implementation with Head ICT to ensure alignment with area/cluster objectives and corporate strategic IT direction
	Identify and implement solutions to user challenges and concerns associated with the use of personal computer equipment
	Monitor, Diagnose, and adjust performance on LAN and networks
	Manage shared technology resources
	Carry out periodic preventative maintenance on machines to ensure their reliability and availability
	Manage secure network access for remote users
	Keep up to date with new technology
	Evaluating technology risks to develop a network disaster recovery plan and backup procedures.
	To be able to quickly and competently diagnose network issues and to resolve or externally escalate them when required
	To assist in the production and maintenance of documentation relating to the Company’s ICT system
	To assist in the administration of the Company’s communication systems including mobile phones, internet connection, and telephone system
	Takes responsibility for the day-to-day operational effectiveness of the Company’s ICT security and compliance with the responsibility of investigating Cybersecurity breaches


 Educational Qualifications, Certifications and Experience


	Educational Qualifications:
	
		Minimum of an HND qualification / B.Sc Degree in Electrical Electronics, Computer Science / Engineering, or other applicable Degree course.
		Necessary certifications such as CCNA, CCNP, CISA, MCSA, et al
	
	
	Experience:
	
		Minimum of 5 years of experience in a similar role.
	
	
	Competencies:
	
		WAN & LAN Management
		VPN
		System troubleshooting
		System maintenance
		Database management
		Microsoft Windows network infrastructure savvy
		AD and DNS savvy
		Knowledge of ICT regulations
		Attention to detail
		Report writing
		Crisis Management skills
		Interpersonal skills
	
	


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to the "HR & Admin department" via: recruitment@ocean-ms.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

General Manager (Real Estate) Job at Novo Developers




        
    

        
        Novo Developers - With a deep commitment to transforming the real estate landscape, Novo Developers was born. We’ve spent years perfecting our craft, from groundbreaking construction projects to bespoke design services, all while putting client satisfaction at the heart of everything we do

We began with a simple mission: To enhance the quality of life of our communities and to give our clients, partners a sense of accomplishment, and over the years, we’ve evolved into a full-service real estate company that delivers exceptional experiences.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager (Real Estate)

Job Location: Nigeria
     

            
    



Job Responsibilities


	Strategic Planning: Developing and implementing strategic plans to advance the company's mission and objectives and to promote revenue, profitability, and growth.
	Financial Management: Overseeing budgeting, financial forecasting, and financial reporting. Ensuring proper financial controls are in place and that the company operates within budgetary guidelines.
	Operations Management: Directing day-to-day operations of the business. This includes overseeing various departments such as sales, marketing, operations, finance, human resources, and customer service.
	Team Leadership: Hiring, training, motivating, and managing employees. Providing leadership and guidance to subordinate managers and staff.
	Customer Relations: Maintaining positive relationships with customers, clients, suppliers, and other stakeholders. Ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction and resolving any customer complaints or issues.
	Business Development: Identifying new business opportunities and partnerships. Developing and implementing strategies to expand the company's market presence and increase revenue streams.
	Risk Management: Identifying and mitigating risks that could impact the company's operations or financial performance. This includes compliance with relevant laws and regulations.
	Performance Monitoring: Establishing key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to measure the company's performance. Monitoring progress towards goals and making adjustments as necessary.
	Communication: Serving as a liaison between upper management and employees. Communicating company policies, objectives, and initiatives to staff and ensuring that everyone is aligned with the company's vision.
	Problem Solving: Addressing any issues or challenges that arise within the organization. Analyzing problems, developing solutions, and implementing changes as needed to improve efficiency and effectiveness.


Job Requirements


	Candidates should possess minimum of B.Sc Degrees with 5 - 10 years of relevant work experience.
	Added advantage - Presentation skill and content creation
	Negotiation skills and closing skills
	People management skills.
